command.text: declare @message nvarchar(4000) if not exists(select 1 from dmstt) select @message = 'this._periodDate=null;this._closingDate=null;' else begin select @message = 'this._periodDate=' + case when ngay_tinh_ky is null then 'null' else 'new Date(''' + convert(varchar(10), ngay_tinh_ky, 111) + ''')' end + ';this._closingDate=' + case when ngay_ks is null then 'null' else 'new Date(''' + convert(varchar(10), ngay_ks, 111) + ''');' end from dmstt end select @message = @message + 'active$VoucherFilter$(this);' select @message as message return
